title.native: でこぼこ魔女の親子事情
title.english: The Family Circumstances of the Irregular Witch

description:
When witch Alyssa found a baby on her doorstep, she didn’t expect her life to take a topsy-turvy turn. Despite her bewilderment, she names the child Viola and decides to raise her. Fast-forward 16 years, and her “daughter” Viola isn’t just taller—she’s towering! Join this bewitching duo in a hilariously chaotic journey of mistaken identities and supernatural shenanigans!

(Source: Crunchyroll)
synonyms: เรื่องราวอีเหละเขะขะของแม่ลูกแม่มด

tags.name: Witch
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a witch.

tags.name: Episodic
tags.description: Features story arcs that are loosely tied or lack an overarching plot.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Family Life
tags.description: Centers around the activities of a family unit.

tags.name: Tanned Skin
tags.description: Prominently features characters with tanned skin.

tags.name: Found Family
tags.description: Features a group of characters with no biological relations that are united in a group providing social support.

tags.name: Surreal Comedy
tags.description: Prominently features comedic moments that defy casual reasoning, resulting in illogical events.

tags.name: Slapstick
tags.description: Prominently features comedy based on deliberately clumsy actions or embarrassing events.

tags.name: Adoption
tags.description: Features a character who has been adopted by someone who is neither of their biological parents.

tags.name: Parenthood
tags.description: Centers around the experience of raising a child.

tags.name: Cute Girls Doing Cute Things
tags.description: Centers around female characters doing cute activities, usually with little to no emphasis on drama and conflict.

tags.name: Elf
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is an elf.

tags.name: Coming of Age
tags.description: Centers around a character's transition from childhood to adulthood.

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: Yandere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is obsessively in love with another, to the point of acting deranged or violent.

title.native: でこぼこ魔女の親子事情

node.description:
__Height:__ 153 cm 

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/NM_NANAPARTY) | [Website](https://www.mizukinana.jp/) | [Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/user/mizukinanaKING) | [Instagram](https://instagram.com/nanamizuki_nm7)

She is admired by many of her fellow actors and fans because of the fact that she has a great amount of power and strength in her singing voice, which surprises many fans due to her regularly petite stature. She was also the winner of the "Best Musical Performance" award in the first Seiyuu Awards. She was also part of the quartet Prits alongside Yumiko Kobayashi, Natsuko Kuwatani, and Hisayo Mochizuki (all four voiced characters in the anime _Sister Princess_). Her singing style comes from singing Enka since she was young.

In July 2020, she married someone from the music industry, and they had their first child on March 16, 2021.

__Non-Anime Roles:__
- Ittasha in Bakuage Sentai Boonboomger
angela is a Japanese pop band. The main members are Yamashita Atsuko (artist name "atsuko") and Hirasato Katsunori (artist name "KATSU").

streamingEpisodes.title: Episode 1 - The Irregular Circumstances of the Close-Knit Family/The Educational Circumstances of the Mysterious Life Form
Episode 2 - The Commonplace Circumstances of the Witch's Child-Rearing/The Romantic Circumstances of the Little Brother Position
Episode 3 - The Reminiscing Circumstances of the Witch-Girl Time Crew/The Sniffly Circumstances of the Healthy Daughter
Episode 4 - The Requesting Circumstances of the Late-Blooming Orc/The Monitoring Circumstances of the Egg and Big Sister
Episode 5 - The Classified Circumstances of the Elfin Forest / The Potato-Digging Circumstances of Love and Legend
Episode 6 - The Assemblage Circumstances of the Rose Garden
Episode 7 - The Circumstances of Yep—Oops—Of Course These Are Pastries! /The Insomnia Circumstances of the Sleep Fairy
Episode 8 - The Cooking Circumstances of the Cursed Witch / The Crazed Circumstances of the Phoenix's Exam
Episode 9 - The Personal Circumstances of the Nervous Mama
Episode 10 - The Troubled Circumstances of the Confined Son / The Public Park Circumstances of Heart vs. Tongue
Episode 11 - The Home Alone Circumstances of the Familiars / The Weight Loss Circumstances of the Corpulent Phoenix / The Romantic Advice Circumstances of the Men without Dates
Episode 12 - The Family Circumstances of the Irregular Witch
